level.heading: Receivers, etc.
level.text: ยง 11-664 Receivers, etc., conducting corporate business. Any receiver, liquidator, referee, trustee, assignee, or other fiduciary or officer or agent appointed by any court, who conducts the business of any corporation, joint-stock company or association shall be subject to the tax or taxes imposed by this subchapter in the same manner and to the same extent as if the business were conducted by the agents or officers of such corporation, joint-stock company or association. A dissolved corporation, joint-stock company or association which continues to conduct business shall also be subjected to the tax imposed by this subchapter.
